manda welawakin panawak da ragena edesata aa manika hisa piramin gos padiya matha hinda gaththa ya.

upan saththwayanata kalin kala - warin wara noyek aakara sapa sampath ha duk - wipath da karmaya hethu kota labena bawa budu dahamehi dakwe.
